name: Omizu no Hanamichi
overview: Omizu no Hanamichi was a 12 episodes TV series aired 1999-Jan-06 to 1999-Mar-24, "Omizu" is more than just a typical story about work in the "night entertainment industry"-it is the story of success that a group of women working as hostesses at a Roppongi club experience. The player takes the role of a young man that is hired in the Paradise Club to take care of the girls that works there at night, and to do that he have to check them while they are working and see if he can make their work better when they are talking with the different men, if he do the job right they will earn more points that at the end of each week he can use to buy new presents (like perfumes, jewels, etc) that the girls will use in their job. Sometimes during the game the player will have to choose between different answers that will leave the story in a way or another. The player some days of the week can go around the town and maybe find girls to talk or date. There is a club and girls status and depending of the points the player's club and girls will be upper or down in the charts. The six girls of the club are: Satsumi, Maya, Sayaka, Yoko, Mayumi & Akina.
